entry.title: Enhanced 2FA experience for your npm account
entry.summary: Late last year, in response to an unprecedented series of account takeovers resulting from the compromise of developer accounts without 2FA enabled, we committed to a variety of enhancements to the npm registry to make two-factor authentication (2FA) adoption easier for developers. Today, we are launching a public beta for a significantly improved 2FA experience [â€¦]

entry.title: Software security starts with the developer: Securing developer accounts with 2FA
entry.summary: GitHub will require all users who contribute code on GitHub.com to enable one or more forms of two-factor authentication (2FA) by the end of 2023.
